title.rendered: Gottwals Books in Publishers Weekly + 3000 Facebook Likes!

content.rendered: Gottwals Books was recently featured in Publishers Weekly. We are thankful for this opportunity and the continued growth of our business. We love the support of our faithful customers! We also reached over 3000 likes on Facebook. If you haven’t liked our Facebook page yet, now is the time!
